channel.title: Need help with npc drop

item.title: Need help with npc drop
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

annyone can help me how to edit npc drop

it show me this but i dont know how to use it

[code]public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic
